title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Leader, Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications and 
Minister for Transport) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister environment climate communication minister transport) order 2024

title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Kate Ruddock, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Kate Ruddock, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is the leader of a political party 
registered in the Register of Political Parties and Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications with effect from 29 January 2024.
text_norm: 2 kate ruddock particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser minister government leader political party registered register political party minister environment climate communication effect 29 january 2024

title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Kate Ruddock, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Kate Ruddock, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is the leader of a political party 
registered in the Register of Political Parties and Minister for Transport with 
effect from 29 January 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
27 March, 2024. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [158] 3
